actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to reduce regulation of surface freight forwarders, and for other purposes.
short_title: Surface Freight Forwarder Deregulation Act of 1984

summary.text: Surface Freight Forwarder Deregulation Act of 1984 - Amends Federal shipping laws to eliminate Interstate Commerce Commission regulations governing the operations of surface freight forwarders.

titles.title: Surface Freight Forwarder Deregulation Act of 1984
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to reduce regulation of surface freight forwarders, and for other purposes.
